actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 411(c) of the Tax Reform Act of 1969.

summary.text: Provides that the provisions of the Tax Reform Act of 1969 relating to the interest or indebtedness incurred by a corporation to acquire the assets of another corporation shall not apply to such indebtedness before January 1, 1980, where the issuing corporation falls within guidelines set by this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 411(c) of the Tax Reform Act of 1969.
